subject: BET
title: New Technology-based Venture Creation
description:
The creation of new ventures is a defining attribute of entrepreneurs.  While the specific focus will be on creating new independent ventures, the theory and principles discussed in this course can be applied to creating new ventures within existing corporation and to new social ventures. 

The MBET program is an experiential program that combines knowing and doing.  BET 604 provides the framework for doing.  It affords the opportunity to apply what is learned in other BET courses to a new venture of each student's choosing.
